entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Runtime Support for Swift Interop #93631
    9.0.0
  • Failing test - `HttpMetricsTest_Http11_Async_HttpMessageInvoker.RequestDuration_ConnectionClosedWhileReceivingHeaders_Recorded` #93627
  • Usage of BOLT (the LLVM post-optimizer) #93626
  • Interlocked.Read from 32-bit apps are much slower on Intel Sapphire Rapids CPUs #93624
  • [API Proposal]: TeeTextWriter #93623
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] [wasm] Test failure in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.TensorPrimitivesTests.MaxMagnitude(tensorLength: 53) #93620
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Init Log Messages on Safari #93622
  • [Mono] [Debug] VS Code debugger for Mono does not attach #93615
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE: Unpredicated instructions #93614
  • Performance Issue with `IsWindowsService` due to Repeated Process Lookups #93613
  • [API Proposal]: Swizzling operators for Vector[2,3,4] similar to HLSL #93609
  • [browser][MT] emscripten_check_mailbox per console character #93603
    9.0.0
  • Configuration Binder turns IList<T> into Array<T> #93601
    9.0.0
  • Cannot reestablish communication with serial device through SerialPort #93599
  • wasm perf pipeline shouldn't run for markdown only changes #93598
  • System.Runtime.Tests assembly crashing with mono runtime and xunit 2.5.1 #93597
    8.0.0
  • [mono][android] Failure in SourceGeneration.Unit.Tests #93592
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT: `NonWasmConsoleBuild_WithWorkload` - test fails 9.0 sdk does not have a 9.0 runtime pack #93585
  • [wasm] WBT tests failing because of missing test app output #93583
  • Interop.cgroups.FindCGroupsVersion broken for cgroups v1 #93581
  • [API Proposal]: Make LocalBuilder abstract #93580
    9.0.0

Closed

  • CoreCLR test infra: improve "Skip" messages for tests blocked in issues.targets #91562
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] Windows x64 NativeAOT PNSE: Arrays with non-zero lower bounds are not supported #93632
    8.0.0
  • AOT Compilation Error (.NET 8.0) #93605
  • [NETSDKE2E] CoreFX symbols are missing while debugging IL Symbols on MacOS #93586
  • [8.0] AOT mono linker build failure: SetupCompileArgumentAttribute does not exist in the current context #93621
    8.0.0
  • Remove the `add_linker_flag` function and instead use `target_link_options` #92843
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE/SVE2 : Unpredicated instructions (part 1 of 4) #93459
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE/SVE2 : Synthetic/helper methods #93464
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE/SVE2 : Unpredicated instructions (part 4) #93462
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE/SVE2 : Unpredicated instructions (part 3) #93461
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE/SVE2 : Unpredicated instructions (part 2) #93460
  • [mono] Stack overflow with MonoFNPtrFakeClass #93607
  • [browser] TensorPrimitivesTests.ConvertToHalf_SpecialValues `-Infinity` #92885
    9.0.0
  • Deprecated package used by System.Security.Cryptography.Cng #93577
  • Dividing by 0 does not throw an exception #93587
  • Test failure Interop/UnmanagedCallersOnly/UnmanagedCallersOnlyNegativeTest/UnmanagedCallersOnlyNegativeTest.cmd #93534
  • Test failure Interop/SuppressGCTransition/SuppressGCTransitionNegativeTest/SuppressGCTransitionNegativeTest.cmd #93533
  • [arm64] Volatile.Read/Write is 2x faster than "volatile" loads/stores #60232
    Future
  • ARM64: Use STLUR/LDUR on arm64-v8.4+ #64457
    Future
  • JIT, SIMD Intrinsics: Recognize `~A & B` as `VectorXxx.AndNot(B, A)` #78303
    Future
  • [6.0, 7.0] System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.Test*WorkingSet* assert failures #93491
  • ECMA-335 Overview of exception handling misleading #12224
    Future
  • corerun with valgrind massif cause a crash #91370
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: make bbID available in release, use it for pred list ordering #93636
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement the OleVariant struct, the OleVariantMarshaller type, and generator integration #93635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Zlib: Update zlib to v1.2.13, intel-zlib to v1.2.13_jtk; add memory protections #93634
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO.Compression
  • Delete unused PalTerminateCurrentProcess #93633
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use locally built ILLink.Tasks with WBT #93629
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Use the KnownFrameworkReference update to change the targeting pack #93625
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add tests for Task.WhenAll #93619
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Disallow casts of bounded arrays to array special interfaces #93617
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Disallow casts of bounded arrays to array special interfaces #93616
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable cgroups hierarchical memory limits support #93611
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Consider atomics throwing #93610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Partially implemented logical immediates on arm64 #93606
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Improved imm64 for negative numbers #93602
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add a test for determinism #93600
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Fix incorrect value in `FirstDayOfWeek` test #93595
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization Get available locales #93594
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst

Merged

  • Provide System.DirectoryServices.Protocols package readme #93518
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Provide Microsoft.Extentions.FileProviders.Physical package readme #93485
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • Provide Microsoft.Extentions.FileProviders.Abstractions package readme #93489
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • Enable Adding Disabled Tests Skip Reason to their XML Results Log From issues.targets #93492
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix NativeAOT test runs #93591
    needs-area-label
  • Build native windows-arm64 Mono cross-compilers #89651
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser] Revert - streamline Task/Promise marshalling (#93010) #93618
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Allows CustomAttribute table to be unsorted in EnC delta #93524
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #93590
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #93589
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] [hot reload][debugger] Resolve field types before use #93559
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Improve disk full test #92682
    area-System.IO
  • Use `add_link_options` and `target_link_options` in cmake #92844
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Remove more active issues for #92885 #93596
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Optimizing arm64 trampolines #93547
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Build less of libs for NativeAOT testing #93604
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix analysis of interface methods on generic types #93540
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Optimize constant range tests #93521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix Vector128 SIMD fmin and fmax #93556
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add a couple feature switches to the repro project #93593
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix test build error when BuildAsStandalone is true #93457
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #93584
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.x
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #93582
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.x
  • Disable negative interop tests on GCStress. #93566
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [6.0] Bump Ubuntu 19.10 queues to 22.04 #93578
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use the improved vectorization algorithm for binary and ternary TensorPrimitives operations #93409
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/6.0-staging] ProcessTests: allow WorkingSet to be zero just after launching the pr… #93574
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Process

Updated

  • Added PowerShell.Benchmarks to SuperPMI collections #93493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Set bbJumpKind and bbJumpDest during block initialization #93415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][amd64] Pass SIMD arguments in SIMD registers. #93182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • Report Requires diagnostics from dataflow analyzer #92724
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Enable IlasmRoundTrip tests for merged tests #93368
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [browser] logging improvements #93472
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix analyzer treatment of flow captures of arrays #93420
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Workloads test: Install the current app.ref pack also #93571
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix MT debugging experience. #90771
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Provide System.IO.Hashing package readme #93567
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Hashing
  • [release/8.0] Remove base type rooting for types in rooted assemblies #93355
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #93456
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Memory.Data package readme #93516
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • JIT: defer creating throw helper blocks until simple lower #93371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Handle MultiRegNode in gtGetRegMask() #93576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorizes IndexOfMin/Max/Magnitude #93469
    area-System.Numerics
  • Use BigMul for 32x32=64 in decimal #93345
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [hot reload][debugger] Resolve field types before use #93558
    area-EnC-mono
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [RISC-V] Fix CodeGen::instGen_Set_Reg_To_Imm #93411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Api append all bytes 84532 #93519
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PackageInstall.Tests timeout known build error #36192
  • The Container test failed due to no available .NET9 images #36160

Closed

  • Can't run multi-project program with different versions of the sqlite package #36184
  • System.Exception : Workload not found #18758
  • F# default project template #18647
  • Warning CS0105 - The using directive for 'System' appeared previously in this namespace - C# 10 and .NET 6.0 #18345
  • The library hostfxr.dll was found, but loading it from [..] failed #18325
  • The remote certificate is invalid because of errors in the certificate chain #18295
  • Razor target could be simplified to avoid escaping error #18293
  • [Package-Validation] Features need to be in PackageValidation with their target timeline. #18203
  • The type or namespace name 'Fakes' does not exist in the namespace 'System' (are you missing an assembly reference?) #14757
  • dotnet workload install always displays "The machine has a pending reboot. Installation will continue, but you may need to restart." #28993

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Define a default set of hot reload capabilities for Blazor WebAssembly #36195
    Area-AspNetCore, Area-Watch
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #36194
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #36193
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36189
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use VS 17.7 for FullFramework tests #36161
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update GivenThatWeWantToPublishAFrameworkDependentApp.cs to fix chars… #35891
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix pending reboot check #36159
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36152
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Fix pending reboot check #36183
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • [#17005] Make Mistyping Errors Gentler #35939
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Also exempt RuntimeIdentifiers Fixes #35575 #36149
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • add --no-http-cache option #35107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create project templates target to 9.0 #34996
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Enable users to install unlisted version of tool if specify the exact match of the version of the tool #36021
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add Compilation parameter to EmitBaseline.CreateInitialBaseline (breaking change) #70413
  • CompletionService cannot be resolved in Blazor WASM #70404

Closed

  • Guidance for using primary constructors when "_underscoreCamelCase" syntax is used for private fields? #70419
  • Pressing `"` should wrap selected text instead of replacing it #70115
    Backlog
  • [LSP] `textDocument/didChange` handler behavior doesn't follow lsp spec #70392
  • Static members missing from completion #70403
  • Pressing F1 on VB.NET operator NameOf goes to the wrong page #68003
  • File local types should hash mapped paths to generate type names #70284
    17.9
  • Collection expressions targeting readonly interfaces should provide an instance implementing nongeneric IList #70253
    17.9
  • Incorporate known spec violations #70043
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Connect inline rename UI to editor smart rename session #70420
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Lambdas #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: spread elements are not expressions #70417
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix classification layering #70416
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update ExternalAccess for EditorConfig #70415
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Apply NotNullIfNotNull postcondition on by-value parameters #70414
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Clear 'run code analysis' results when a build completes #70412
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use a simple diagnostic identifier to dedupe diagnostics #70410
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #70408
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Mark diagnostics as being 'live' or not in LSP #70402
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #70401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Add support to the LSIF generator for document symbols #70304
    Area-IDE, Next
  • (17.8) Collection expressions - error when we can't emit good codegen for ImmutableArray #70411
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: prefer ReadOnlySpan<T> over Span<T> in overload resolution (#70328) #70395
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Deprecate API and add NFW telemetry for it #70365
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix 'Color Color' completion logic #70405
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix lsp didChange processing. #70407
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add F1 help for `NameOf` keyword in Visual Basic #70386
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • File types need to account for pathmap #70322
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70409
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Restore "Do source-generation only in our OOP process" #70109
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • PR for testing purposes #70174
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • WIP: Perform source gen out of proc (sync all) #70334
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add extra validation for Compilations having the expected trees #70347
    Area-IDE, untriaged, OnDeckForServicing
  • Collection expressions: synthesized list types should implement ICollection and IList #70288
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Document deviations from the C# standard #70121
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Faster checksum syncing for documents. #70385
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update Multiple Inheritance Lookup Ambuguity.md #70367
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Trying to fix integration tests #70371
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70421
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Separate build and test phases in integration tests #70400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • EnC: Update deleted lambdas to throw MissingMethodException #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool instances of SymbolDisplayVisitor #70363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize `T? ?? <expr>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<expr>)` for a side-effectless `<expr>` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Allow invisible editor support to handle open aspx files. #70396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Validate diagnostic ID in Experimental attribute #70397
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Add refactoring to convert a primary-constructor-parameter to a normal constructor. #70399
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implementation of C# code mapper #70309
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rename Razor compiler assemblies #69655
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Perform source gen out of proc (sync project cone) #70333
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WindowsIdentity.RunImpersonated does not achieve TokenAccessLevels.Impersonate #51455
  • [ASP.NET Core metrics] Discrepancies between spec and implementation #51454
  • InputRadio didn't accept "checked" attribute #51451
  • UserManager.ChangePasswordAsync doesn't sign out on other devices #51450
  • Perf regression: plaintext #51449
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #51448
  • Blazor Minify, Bundle Static Files - Native Support #51446
  • Blazor RenderModeAuto detect when WASM client is downloaded / available #51445
  • Is {PARAMETER NAME}Expression API in blazor data binding internal only? #51444
  • data-enhanced-nav=false is ignored on <svg> elements #51440
    .NET 9 Planning
  • NavigationLock not working with enhanced navigation #51436
  • Swagger spec should respect `body` and `response_body` when specified #51434
  • [Blazor .Net 8 RC2] Not able to register services in Wasm client project #51432
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #51431
  • Radio button checked property not reset after enhanced form request #51429
    8.0.x
  • Enhance GET form requests by default #51427
    .NET 9 Planning

Closed

  • Blazor Minify, Bundle Static Files - Native Support #51452
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #50602
  • Enhanced Navigation does not scroll new page to top #51338
  • [.NET 8 RC2] HttpContext is null in Login.razor (Identity scaffold) with InteractiveServer globally enabled #51422
  • Component will be prerendered (executed) in server with InteractiveWebAssembly settings. #51342
  • Creating a new Blazor Web App NET8 RC2 with WebAssembly Interactivity creates broken Error.razor page in Client project #51352
  • Blazor .Net 8 RC2 Routing: LocationChanged not triggered #51366
  • CORS with SignalR (.NET 7.0.12) does not work in Blazor WebAssembly App #51433
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #51272
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #51423

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixing Problem #49415 in HtmlHelper.HiddenFor() Functionality for .NET 6 #51453
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Update third party notices for Components and ProjectTemplates #51443
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Update the IdentityModel version to 7.0.3 #51430
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, area-auth

Merged

  • Add SetBrowserRequestStreamingEnabled extension method #50481
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Add 8.0 PRs to servicing project #51425
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update SDK #51240
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine ResponseTests.HttpsConnectionClosedWhenResponseDoesNotSatisfyMinimumDataRate #51369
    area-networking
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Improve MultipartReader performance #51426
    Perf, area-networking
  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-mvc, area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-17

Issues

Created

  • `dotnet-dsrouter android` does not appear to work for Android devices #4337
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Dotnet Monitor] Small Fix For SDM Triggers #4332

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [regression/7.0.96] [Windows] Uneven rows in vertical CollectionView do not resize when item content size changes #18078
  • clang++ exited with code 1 #18072
  • New Bug in .NET 8: Windows and Android no longer draw Borders/clipping correctly (previously was okay) #18071
  • Visual Studio freezes with "Loading document..." message after saving XAML file #18069
  • Right grid padding seems to be doubled on smaller screen size in iOS #18067

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.1.7762] .NET 8 RC1 cannot use Syncfusion controls - SfListView gives System.TypeLoadException #17265
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] Entire page glitches when using Shell #17157
    .NET 8 GA
  • iPad physical device won't open any maui app. (Maui Net8 P7) #17268
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/7.0.59] Can't set MAUI iOS Navigation Icon after updating to 17.6 Preview 1 #13914
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [MAUI]Updating both NuGet packages to nightly, build fails with error CS0246 #18074
  • iOS Border crops/masks underlying elements wrong with clearly abnormal visual effect (iOS only) - repro project included #17998

PullRequests

Created

  • Setup legacy mappers #18087
  • set the parents to installer #18086
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • [net8.0] Update CoherentParentDependency #18085
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.2045.28 to 1.0.2088.41 #18084
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #18080
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Revert "Run template tests run in parallel to save 15min of run time" #18077
    area/templates 📄
  • Force ShapeHandler to exist when adding shape to border #18076
    area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • Support finding nearest TFM to collect assets from #18068
    area/single project ☝️, .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18066
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 8 GA #18061
    .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Update packages for rtm #17980
    .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Make Entitlements in Templates for MacCatalyst more consistent between debug and release configs. #17986
    .NET 8 GA

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core and using reflections #32078
  • Temp tables #32076
  • INNER JOIN instead of LEFT JOIN #32075
  • EFCore 8 RC2 - Converters not getting used in some cases for an entity property which is part of JSON #32073
  • Check if Table exists #32071

Closed

  • Increased query memory usage on EFCore 8 RC2 #32052
    8.0.0
  • How do I upgrade the existing entities from EF 6.1 to EF Core 7 without breaking/changing the inheritance strategy or behavior? #32077
  • Stack overflow when using compiled model #32072
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design 8.0.0-rc.2.23480.1 requires Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Workspaces = 4.5.0 #32070
  • Model validation throws for non-generic collection properties #32055
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Revert Azure SQL streaming breaking change #32069
    Servicing-approved
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 7.0.11 to 7.0.12 #32063
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Azure.Identity from 1.10.1 to 1.10.2 #32064
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/8.0] Don't throw for non-generic collection types #32059
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #31961 - Projection filtering on second-level reference could not be translated #31996
    Servicing-approved
